##trend
```{r}
crimes$total <- rowSums(crimes[,-c(1:6)],na.rm = TRUE) #sum of all types of crimes for each institution
crimes.split <- split(crimes, f = as.factor(crimes$Survey.year))
year.sum <- NA
for(i in 1: length(crimes.split)){
 year.sum[i] <- sum(crimes.split[[i]]$total) 
} #calculate total crimes of every year
```
